messages.title: A record of action
messages.content: A promise for more - First for the jobs and schools guarantee - A leading voice against government waste - Helped secure City deal and Olympic legacy

messages.title: I want to hear from you!
messages.content: Please get in touch if there are issues you want to raise or ideas you want to share.

issues.economy: A leading voice against government waste
issues.education: First for the jobs and schools guarantee

housing.content: Helped secure City deal and Olympic legacy

leaflet.additionalNotes: Here supporting Rushanara because: She understands the challenges we face - She has a strong sense of social justice - She has a track record of standing up for our area - She is effective and works hard for our community - She inspires others to believe in politics again - She brings fresh energy and ideas
